title: Laidback Beachside Break in Alexandra Headland - Perfect for Families or Groups
description: Looking for an easy, sun-kissed escape with friends or family? Look no further than Grand Palais Beachside Resort, located just steps from Alexandra Headland Beach - one of the finest on the Sunshine Coast. Kick back in a spacious, oceanfront self-catering apartment, close to a plethora of dining and entertainment options, with a continental breakfast pack, a complimentary bottle of wine, daily parking, two hoursâ€™ bicycle rental per person and guaranteed late checkout at 11am.

title: Laidback Alexandra Headland Apartments in the Heart of Sunshine Coast with Guaranteed Oceanfront Upgrade
description:
Experience the epitome of beachside living at the Grand Palais Beachside Resort, where comfort, convenience and coastal relaxation combine for a Sunshine Coast stay like no other. Ideally located just steps from Alexandra Headland Beach, this resort offers a collection of stylish apartments, all spacious enough for easy family living with private balconies and ocean views. Paddle out to the surf break, or dip your toes in closer to the shore, before returning to your spacious apartment to relax as you please with a soak in the resort's heated swimming pool, or cook up a storm in the alfresco BBQ entertainment area.

Start your beach-bound adventures with a barista-made coffee from a local cafe, or stroll on over to Mooloolaba, where top-rated cafes, eclectic shopping strips and pristine stretches of beach await.
